overview:
Ljuba Kotaskova is the Account Director of Socialbakers’ agency division Candytech responsible for new business and building long term relationship with local as well as global clients.

Before Socialbakers, she spent 2 years in internet advertising agency Publicis Modem creating online strategies and leading online projects for such clients as Danone or Microsoft. Prior to Publicis, Ljuba worked in Online Marketing department for Microsoft Czech Republic where she was responsible for the regional web presentation and customer satisfaction.
